1.0.name: wordpress/shortcode-menu
1.0.description:
This plugin gives more flexibility for custom menu. Shortcodes will be used to show your menu in the Sidebars, Footer Sidebars, Posts or Pages. Using shortcode you can customize the menu attributes. Also you can set your custom id or class to a menu. You can display ordered list menu as well.

We have added the option of display style so users can display menu inline or block.

The main feature is that, we have enhanced the sub menu to display it more effectively. You can disable this feature.

To create your shortcode without writing any code. Just use our shortcode creator for your menu.
